SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Publisher
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Game.Player
public class Player extends Publisher
The Player class represents a player in the game. Each player has a name, Color, and a Station.
